title: Reverse Speech - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/12/17
itunes:title: Reverse Speech - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/12/17
description:
George Noory and guest David John Oates discuss his research into the field of reverse speech to discover hidden messages by playing recordings of public figures and other people backwards.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
